name: saguaro
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a type of large cactus (= a desert plant with sharp points) that has upright branches and grows mainly in the southwestern United States : Saguaros first blossom when they are 50 to 60 years old. It is a desert landscape of canyons, copper mines, and saguaro cactuses.
More examplesFewer examplesMany saguaro and other sensitive plants were salvaged.The magnificent saguaros cannot survive wildfires.There are giant saguaro cactuses by the side of the road.
